::DarkMouse::

She stayed on the floor curled up over her knees.  She looked at the 
floor and sighed an agrivated sigh. "Blast it all. I was hoping this 
wouldn't happen. Blast!"  she tried to get up but her legs wouldn't 
respond to her.  She stayed there for a moment.  "Hey Quickstrike, I 
got a question to ask you. Are you still my friend and comrad in 
arms?" She had to ask it.  She wanted to know for sure if he ever 
considered her a friend. Nothing more, just a friend. She knew she 
was programmed before. But now she was free from her program and was 
finally able to ask the question. She had always thought of him a 
friend and a kind of big brother. But she had to know if he felt the 
same. She had to know who were her friends, and she hoped he was one 
of them.
